content:
Here's your competitive landscape analysis:

1. Direct Competitors (Smart Toys):
- LeapFrog: Strong brand, basic adaptivity ($40-80)
- Osmo: iPad-based learning, no AI ($60-120)
- Roybi Robot: AI features, limited personalization ($199)

2. Your Advantages:
- True AI personalization (vs preset responses)
- Growing content library (vs fixed content)
- Multi-subject learning (vs single focus)
- Parent dashboard with insights

3. Market Position:
- Premium educational AI toy ($249 price point)
- Focus on continuous learning & adaptation
- Emphasis on parent involvement
- Regular content updates included

Shall we detail the product features and value proposition next?
